Package com.hire.controller

Class BaseController

java.lang.Object
javax.servlet.GenericServlet
javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
com.hire.controller.BaseController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
Direct Known Subclasses:
AuthentificationController, BestCustomerController, CreateCustomerController, CreateHireLocationController, CreateVehicleController, DeleteCustomerController, DeleteVehicleController, HirePaymentController, HomeController, ModifyCustomerController, ModifyVehicleController, RegisterController, ResearchCustomerController, ResearchHireController, ResearchVehicleController, SheetCustomerController, VehicleSheetController
public class BaseController
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
Base class used to centralized some methods shared by all application's controllers

  • Method Details

    • isAuthenticated

      protected boolean isAuthenticated​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Tells if a user is currently authenticated or not
      Parameters:
      request - The current HttpServletRequest
      Returns:
      True if a user is authenticated, else false

    • isAuthenticated

      protected boolean isAuthenticated​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws java.io.IOException
      Tells if a user is currently connected or not and send a redirection to login page
      Parameters:
      request - The current HttpServletRequest
      response - The response that will be sent. Used to redirect user when they are not authenticated
      Returns:
      True if user was authenticated, else false. When false, response is set to redirect to login page
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Exception could be thrown by redirection

    • redirectToView

      protected void redirectToView​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp, java.lang.String viewName, java.lang.String title)
      Sends a given view to user
      Parameters:
      req - The current HttpServletRequest to be sent to JSP
      resp - The response that will be sent to user, which is dispatch to JSP
      viewName - The view name as the path to the corresponding JSP file
      title - The title of the view (default is "Hire")

    • redirectToView

      protected void redirectToView​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp, java.lang.String viewName)
      Sends a given view to user
      Parameters:
      req - The current HttpServletRequest to be sent to JSP
      resp - The response that will be sent to user, which is dispatch to JSP
      viewName - The view name as the path to the corresponding JSP file

    • redirectToHome

      protected void redirectToHome​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp) throws java.io.IOException
      Redirects user to the home page
      Parameters:
      req - The current HttpServletRequest to be sent to JSP
      resp - The response that will be sent to user, which is dispatch to JSP
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • getEmployee

      protected Employee getEmployee​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
      Returns the current authenticated employee if there is one
      Parameters:
      req - The current request
      Returns:
      The employee instance or null
